sentences.en: According to official records, five people were killed last year near that road junction.
sentences.cn: 据官方记录，去年有五人在那个路口附近丧生。

sentences.en: Australia's rugby union side enjoyed a record-breaking win over France.
sentences.cn: 澳大利亚的英式橄榄球联盟队创纪录地赢了法国队。

sentences.en: Carl Lewis has broken the world record in the 100 metres.
sentences.cn: 卡尔·刘易斯已经打破了百米赛跑的世界纪录。

sentences.en: Exports in June rose 1.5% to a record $30.91 billion.
sentences.cn: 6月份的出口额上升了1.5%，创下309.1亿美元的历史最高纪录。

sentences.en: Ferris has a rare ability to record her observations on paper.
sentences.cn: 费里斯具备把自己的观察结果记录下来的超强能力。

sentences.en: for the record, I have never been to the flat.
sentences.cn: 必须申明备查的是我从未去过那套公寓。

sentences.en: go on record in favor of the mayor's reelection.
sentences.cn: 公开表明支持市长再次当选

sentences.en: He found no evidence of collusion between record companies and retailers.
sentences.cn: 他没发现唱片公司与零售商串通一气的证据。

sentences.en: Her husband made her record every penny she spent.
sentences.cn: 她丈夫要她把花的每分钱都记下来。

sentences.en: His record reveals a tough streak.
sentences.cn: 他的经历说明他个性坚强。

sentences.en: I spent a lot of time listening to records .
sentences.cn: 我花了很多时间听唱片。

sentences.en: If your next record's a bit iffy, you're forgotten.
sentences.cn: 如果你的下一张唱片出点问题，你就被遗忘了。

sentences.en: Profits were at record levels.
sentences.cn: 利润水平是创纪录的。

sentences.en: Sampdoria lost their unbeaten record with a 2-1 home defeat against Genoa.
sentences.cn: 桑普多利亚队主场1比2负于热那亚队之后，终止了自己的不败纪录。

sentences.en: Schools are booting out record numbers of unruly pupils.
sentences.cn: 学校开除了数量空前的难以管教的小学生。

sentences.en: She took the needle off the record and turned the lights out.
sentences.cn: 她把唱针从唱片上移开，把灯也关了。

sentences.en: The American team set a new world record in the sprint relay.
sentences.cn: 美国队在短跑接力赛中创了一项新的世界纪录。

sentences.en: The coroner recorded a verdict of accidental death.
sentences.cn: 验尸官作出了意外死亡的结论。

sentences.en: The group has just recorded a new album.
sentences.cn: 这个组合刚录制了一张新专辑。

sentences.en: The job needs someone with a good track record in investment.
sentences.cn: 这项工作需要有良好投资业绩的人来担当。

sentences.en: The senator told the reporters that his remarks were strictly off the record.
sentences.cn: 那位参议员告诫记者们，他的评论决不可以被引用

sentences.en: The senator's opposition to the new legislation is on record.
sentences.cn: 参议员在新立法体系中的位置已记录在案

sentences.en: The volunteers kept a record of everything they ate for a week.
sentences.cn: 志愿者记录下他们一周所吃的所有食物。

sentences.en: The water level in Lake Taihu has reached record levels.
sentences.cn: 太湖水位达到了历史最高值。

sentences.en: There have been record bankruptcies and remorselessly rising unemployment.
sentences.cn: 破产案数量达到最高纪录，失业率持续上升。

sentences.en: This could have been one of the coldest golf tournaments on record.
sentences.cn: 这很可能是高尔夫锦标赛比赛史上天气最为寒冷的一次.

sentences.en: This is it, folks: the best record guide in the business.
sentences.cn: 就是这个，伙计们，业内最好的唱片指南。
